title: backlog
content: so i am a first year student and i got a backlog so i want to know after esa will i have my backlog exam or during esa, and if after esaâ€™s then will it follow the same time table as 2 exam per week or continuous? can you guys please tell me is it easy to to pass backlogs??

comments.body:
it will be conducted with the next regular exams, dates will be in the same time table.   
IMO - Subjects are easier to pass in semester than backlogs cuz your internal scored marks will not be considered. Its okay, just study next time.  
  
Question wise difficulty is exactly same. Just 40/100 is passing marks.   
  
As a tip i suggest going to your faculty, they will guide you. Don't shy away from them.
High emphasis on last point, my professor gave me his own notes and made question bank himself for me. I not only passed but got better grade than the subjects i originally passed in.
It's at the same time as regular exams...if theres any clash with ur year subjects ur supposed to inform before the final time table for exams release.
